PerfectNetExp.abs: 英汉辞典-T - 大力水手的家 - Yahoo!奇摩部落格 ... thankless 不知感恩的 thanklessness 不知感恩 thanks 感谢.

list.abs: 她在剧中扮演了一个次要的角色。 She acted as a minor role in the play. 她扮演了一个受累不讨好的角色。 She played a thankless role. 他在剧中扮演.
He is a thankless child ., 他是个不知感恩的孩子.
BEING a Middle East peace envoy is a thankless task ., 做一个中东和平使者是一项不讨好的任务.
take into account 重视,考虑thankless task 吃力不讨好的事情thorny problem 棘手的问题
Roosevelt was reluctant to undertake the thankless task ., 罗斯福不大愿意承担这种徒劳无益的任务.

auth_sentence.content: He sighed, looking for words to describe the thanklessness of being a New Orleans cop.
